Tip of the Day
Being overencumbered only slows down your activities, but doesn't affect travel.

Large stone
Type: Material
Value: 1
Fine Value: 11
Keyword: Misc.
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

A larger stone than normal.

The Large stone item is a material.

Uses

Recipe Ingredient

Large stone is an ingredient in the following recipe:

Item Name Service
Requirement 		Skills Materials
Used 		Recipe
Outputs
Craft a bag of rocks None Crafting lvl. 5 1x Sturdy branch
1x Large stone		 1x Bag of rocks

Sources

Activity Drops

Activity Name Skills Quantity Chance Odds Base
Rate 		W.E.A.R.‡
Stone quarrying Mining lvl. 1 1 2.903% ~1 in 34 1,343 steps 861 steps

‡W.E.A.R is a value that shows the average steps for one item at maximum work efficiency.
